entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 08:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 7.3°C
Wind: S 27 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers near noon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 50 gusting to 80 near Bowen Island this morning. Wind becoming light late this morning. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
